tags.name: queue-credentials-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing credential-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing credential objects within queues. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: queue-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing queue-related operations.

This controller provides endpoints for managing queues, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting queue configurations. Authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-url-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing URL-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing URLs within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-media-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing media-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing media objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-enclosure-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing enclosure-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing enclosure objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-contributor-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing contributor-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing contributor objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-content-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing content-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing content objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-author-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing author-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing author objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing post-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing posts within queues. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

tags.name: post-category-controller
tags.description:
Controller class for managing category-related operations.

 This controller provides endpoints for managing category objects within posts. Authenticated
 users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" have access to these operations.

put.summary: Update the password on the queue credential given by username, on a queue given by Id
put.description:
Update a password for the queue credential given by username.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the
 password of a queue credential object identified by its username, on a queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update

parameters.name: basicUsername
parameters.description: The basic username of the credential to update

delete.summary: Delete the queue credential given by username, on a queue given by Id
delete.description:
Delete a queue credential given by username.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete a
 a queue credential identified by its index, on a queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to delete

parameters.name: basicUsername
parameters.description: The username of the credential to delete

put.summary: Update the properties of an existing queue
put.description:
Update the properties of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the properties of an existing queue identified by itsId. The queue's configuration properties are provided in the request body.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to be updated

requestBody.description: The updated queue configuration properties.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to be deleted

put.summary: Change the title of an existing queue
put.description:
Change the title of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the title of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the title for

requestBody.description: The updated queue title.

delete.summary: Delete the title from a queue given by Id
delete.description:
Delete the title for a queue given by Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete
 the title from a queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue with the title to delete

put.summary: Change the status of an existing queue
put.description:
Change the status of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the status of an existing queue. The status change can be used to mark a queue for import or un-mark it for import.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the status for

requestBody.description: The request containing the updated queue status information.

put.summary: Change the language of an existing queue
put.description:
Change the language of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the language of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the language for

requestBody.description: The updated queue language.

put.summary: Change the image source of an existing queue
put.description:
Change the image source of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the image source of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the image source for

requestBody.description: The source for the queue thumbnail image.

delete.summary: Delete the image source from a queue given by Id
delete.description:
Delete the image source for a queue given by Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete
 the image source from a queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue with the image source to delete

put.summary: Change the ident string of an existing queue
put.description:

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the ident string of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the ident string for

requestBody.description: The updated queue ident string.

parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the generator for

delete.description:

 the generator from a queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue with the generator to delete

put.description:

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the copyright of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the copyright for

requestBody.description: The updated queue copyright.

delete.description:

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue with the copyright to delete

put.summary: Change the authentication requirements of an existing queue
put.description:
Change the authentication requirement of an existing queue.

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the authentication requirement of an existing queue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to update the authentication requirement for

requestBody.description: The request containing the updated authentication requirement.

put.summary: Update the post URL given by idx, on a post given by Id
put.description:
Update a post URL given by index.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update a
 post URL identified by its index, on a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to update

parameters.name: urlIdx
parameters.description: The index of the URL to update

requestBody.description: A PostUrl, representing the URL to update.

delete.summary: Delete the post URL given by idx, on a post given by Id
delete.description:
Delete a post URL given by index.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete a
 post URL identified by its index, on a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post from which the URL will be removed

parameters.name: urlIdx
parameters.description: The index of the URL to delete

get.summary: Get all medias in the post given by its Id
get.description:
Get all media in the post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve all
 medias in a specific post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch medias from

put.summary: Update the post media object on a post given by Id
put.description:

 post media object, on a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to update

requestBody.description: A PostMedia object, representing new media to update.

delete.summary: Delete the post media object on a post given by Id
delete.description:
Delete a post media object from a post given by Id,

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete a
 a post media object on a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to delete

put.summary: Update the post given by Id
put.description:
Update a post given by Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the post to update

requestBody.description: The request containing the updated post.

delete.description:

parameters.name: id

put.summary: Update the publication status of the post given by Id
put.description:
Update the publication status of the post given by Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to update the
 publication status of a post identified by its Id. The status can be 'PUB_PENDING',
 'DEPUB_PENDING', or null.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the post to update

requestBody.description: The request containing the updated post status.

get.summary: Get all queue definitions
get.description: Get all queue definitions for the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: List of queue configuration requests.

get.summary: Get all credentials in the queue given by its Id
get.description:
Get all credential in the queue given by its Id.  Passwords are masked.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve all
 credentials in a specific queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to fetch credentials from

post.summary: Add new credential to the queue given by its Id
post.description:
Add new credential to the queue given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to add new credential
 to a specific queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to add credential to

requestBody.description: A QueueCredentialConfigRequest object representing new credential to add.

get.summary: Get all posts in the queue given by its Id
get.description:
Get all posts in the queue given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve all
 posts in a specific queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to fetch posts from

post.summary: Create new posts in the queue given by queueId
post.description:
Create new posts in the queue given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to create new posts
 in a specific queue identified by its Id.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The Id of the queue to create posts in

requestBody.description: A list of PostConfigRequests, representing new posts to add.

get.description:

get.summary: Get the rights string of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the rights string of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 rights string of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch rights string from

get.summary: Get the queue Id of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the queue Id of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 queue Id of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch queue Id from

get.summary: Get the published timestamp of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the published timestamp of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 published timestamp of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch published timestamp from

get.summary: Get the iTunes descriptor of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the iTunes descriptor of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 iTunes descriptor of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch iTunes descriptor from

get.summary: Get the expiration timestamp of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the expiration timestamp of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 expiration timestamp of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch expiration timestamp from

get.summary: Get the description of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the description of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 description of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch description from

get.summary: Get the comment string of a post given by its Id.
get.description:
Get the comment string of a post given by its Id.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to retrieve the
 comment string of a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to fetch comment string from

delete.summary: Delete the post category given by idx, on a post given by Id
delete.description:
Delete a post category given by index.

 This endpoint allows authenticated users with the "VERIFIED_ROLE" to delete a
 a post category identified by its index, on a post identified by its Id.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The Id of the post to delete

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: The name of the category to delete

copyright.description: The copyright information of the queue.

imgSrc.description: The image source of the queue.

id.description: The unique identifier of the queue.

generator.description: The generator information of the queue.

transportIdent.description: The transport identifier of the queue.

exportConfig.description: The configuration for exporting the queue.

copyright.description: The copyright information of the queue.

queueImgSrc.description: The image source of the queue.

lastDeployed.description: The timestamp when the queue was last deployed.

isAuthenticated.description: Whether authentication is required for the queue.

newStatus.description: The new status to be set for the queue.

QueueStatusUpdateRequest.description: The request containing the updated queue status information

isRequired.description: The new authentication requirement to be set for the queue.

hreflang.description: The language of the content at the URL.

rel.description: The relationship of the URL to the current document.

PostUrl.description: Represents a URL associated with a post.

postMediaGroups.description: List of media groups associated with the post.

postMediaContents.description: List of media contents associated with the post.

PostMedia.description: Represents media information associated with a post.

length.description: The length of the enclosure in bytes.

PostEnclosure.description: Represents an enclosure associated with a post.

email.description: The email address of the person.

PostPerson.description: Represents a person associated with a post.

type.description: The type of the content object.

value.description: The value of the content object.

ContentObject.description: Represents a content object within a post.

author.description: The author associated with this post

isExplicitNullable.description: Indicates if the explicit status is nullable

image.description: The URL of the image associated with the post

imageUri.description: The URI of the image associated with the post

PostITunes.description: Represents iTunes-specific metadata associated with a post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the post.

queueId.description: The ID of the queue to which the post belongs.

postContents.description: A list of ContentObject objects (the post content)

postUrls.description: A list of alternate post URLs

importTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the post was imported.

postComment.description: The comment associated with the post.

postRights.description: The rights associated with the post.

contributors.description: The list of contributors to the post.

authors.description: The list of authors of the post.

postCategories.description: The list of categories associated with the post.

publishTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the post was published.

expirationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the post will expire.

enclosures.description: The list of enclosures associated with the post.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the last update to the post.

newStatus.description: The new status to be set for the post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the queue credential.

QueueCredential.description: Represents a credential for a feed queue.
